thread.title: President Obama addresses live-streamed Chicago attack: ‘We appear to have seen’ a hate crime
thread.title_full: President Obama addresses live-streamed Chicago attack: ‘We appear to have seen’ a hate crime

author: William A.
title: President Obama addresses live-streamed Chicago attack: ‘We appear to have seen’ a hate crime
text:
President Obama addresses live-streamed Chicago attack: ‘We appear to have seen’ a hate crime Posted at 8:04 pm on January 5, 2017 by William A. 
President Barack Obama was in Chicago Thursday to prepare for next week’s farewell address. He gave an interview to CBS Chicago in which he addressed the kidnapping and torture of a disabled man that was streamed live on Facebook. Obama Calls Facebook Torture Video 'Despicable', But Optimistic About Race Relations In U.S. https://t.co/2nqdutelde 
— CBS Chicago (@cbschicago) January 5, 2017 
ABC News also tweeted about the interview: Pres. Obama says "we appear to have seen" a hate crime in the alleged attack on a Chicago man captured on Facebook. https://t.co/4ksnnwAClz pic.twitter.com/g6dcqICCHX 
— ABC News (@ABC) January 5, 2017 
The public doesn’t seem to agree that race relations have gotten any better under President Obama’s watch.
